title: I wonder how the status condition Paralyzed would be in  LoL
body:
http://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb/5/5e/Ash_Pikachu_Static.png/250px-Ash_Pikachu_Static.png

Some champions have a silence that completely shuts down abilities/spells which shuts down a ton of option except attacking


Where if LoL had the status condition Paralyzed it would make things more evil while it wouldn't shut down a champion for good like we have with silence or blind 

Paralyzed champions have a chance to freeze for a sec and it would cancel a spell or an auto attack for a sec
Once a champion got Paralyzed he cannot be Paralyzed again for small amount of time
Just like it is with {{champion:85}} 

http://25.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m3aw2ct9sM1qckwxco1_500.gif
Do you think the status condition Paralyzed could be implanted in League of Legends?
I think it would be quite interesting to more status conditions in game but thats just me mehehehehehe
